title: One more addition to Urgot's Ult execution and He would be PERFECT
body:
basically , whenever someone is low and gets pulled by urgot , his screen turns red and bloody (just like warwick's blood hunt) but more terrifying and maybe even with some scary sounds before getting crushed and deleted from the rift , THIS WOULD MAKE HIM PERFECT ON EVERY ASPECT 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body:
No. Im already terrified of this execution animation as it is. 
No.
i mean come on , there arent many terrfying champions besides warwick , more terror with this guy wont hurt right ? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
{{champion:56}} and old {{champion:107}} (Rengar jumping out with no warning has made me spazz out more times than I'd like to admit)
indeed :)
{{champion:28}} {{champion:29}} and sometimes {{champion:121}} as well.

Long ago when I was doing an 8 hour LoL marathon, I was getting quite sleepy towards the end, as the top lane cs game goes. An enemy Xin E blasting through my headphones as he jumped me from a bush literally made me fall off my stool and disconnect the router cable with my foot.
Old Rengar wasn't scary. He was annoying. You didn't have that moment to feel scared cause you were already dead. Now his ult is more scarier.
Nah now I'm ready to react.  Before, my mind would try to react in the split-second of his jump, causing all my muscles to just twitch and scream internally.
I like the way you think.
Says the guy with a Little Devil Teemo icon LOL
thanks {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
At LEAST for butcher Urgot.

And a maniacal laugh, we can't forget about the maniacal laugh 
~~The enemies sure wouldn't forget~~
JESUS H. CHRIST I'D ALREADY CRY WITH THE REGULAR ANIMATION
I would also add blood vfx splashing out while they get crushed
{{champion:3}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:54}} not every champion has blood though
{{champion:8}} doesn't seem to have issues.
He just pools to dodge logic
i just want my blood {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
If it lives it has to bleed.

*Screen goes red and warps like a little nightmares death scene
URGOTGASM

Maybe even have the death audio's of the other champions be changed by pitch as they get grinded (included with the gore or the way it is now) so like its regular, but then it gets 20% louder and the pitch either goes higher or lower, either way distorted and right before the audio finishes it cuts off with like someone being beheaded 

purfect
i like ths. rito plz
He needs to laugh when killing someone with it, like Veigar's ult

Grinds up a Blitzcrank and gets covered in blood
.
Yo rito flag this for when you make a legendary skin for him!
Warwick's Blood Hunt already scares the hell out of me. I think I can do without Urgot Voorhees running me through the meat grinder too. {{item:3070}}
you mean a global laugh?
Actually I was hoping that using Disdain E while the Target was getting pulled in would launch them further behind Urgot so it's more like his old ult.

>basically , whenever someone is low and gets pulled by urgot , *photorealistic depiction of Urgot brutally mutilating your corpse mortal kombat style before spraying the guts everywhere and leaving a trail of blood on the floor, and then a jumpscare of Urgot' face covered in your intestines appears*

FTFY
it should go fully red before it goes grey.
